comments_since_last_sample.body:
I was always against the wars and we destroyed whatever little respect we had before.
The thought that these countries are  conspiring/consulting with China and Russia is terrible and nothing good will come out of this.
It's been happening for a while now and I feel that is one of the main reason that Biden had to finally pull us out of Afghanistan. 
Things are bad and it looks like it's getting worse.
